summary: Amish teenagers experience and embrace the modern world as a rite-of-passage before deciding which life they will choose.
cast: Velda Bontrager|Mark Bontrager|Dewayne Chupp|Dylan Cole|Matt Eash|Sally Fisher|Marty Fry|John Groff|Lisa Groff|Andy Herschberger|Joann Hochstetler|Jesse Kaufman|Carol Lambright|Dale Lambright|Ervin Lambright|Velda Lehman|Alvin Miller|Emma Miller|Scott Stuart|Sara Tackett|Lydia Troyer|Amos Yoder|Christine Yoder|Faron Yoder|Mel Yoder|Phil Yoder|Steve Yoder|Waneta Yoder|Allan Yutzy|Gerald Yutzy
title: Devil's Playground
